item.title: 规模虽小但日益壮大的反对党警告日本央行加息过快
item.description: 日本央行可能正以过快速度加息，这可能损害经济，一个规模虽小但日益壮大的在野党党首如是说。该国正为下月举行的国会选举做准备。【原文：The Bank of Japan may be raising interest rates too rapidly, which could hurt the economy, the head of a small but rising opposition party said, as the country gears up for a general election next month.】

item.title: 加密货币公司BitGo在美国IPO中筹集2.128亿美元
item.description: 加密货币托管公司BitGo周三将其美国首次公开募股定价定在预期区间之上，筹集资金2.128亿美元，为2026年首家数字资产公司登陆股市铺平道路。【原文：Crypto custody firm ​BitGo priced ‌its U.S. initial public offering ‌above its indicated range ​on Wednesday, raising $212.8 ‍million and paving the way ⁠for the ‍first stock market ‌debut ‌by a digital asset company ⁠in ⁠2026.】

item.title: 特朗普放弃对格陵兰岛加征关税的威胁后，油价小幅上涨
item.description: 周四油价小幅上涨，此前美国总统在试图吞并格陵兰岛的过程中收回了加征关税的威胁，这降低了美欧贸易战的风险，并提振了全球经济和石油需求。【原文：Oil prices edged up on Thursday after the U.S. president stepped back from threats to impose tariffs in his effort to seize Greenland, reducing the risk of a U.S.–Europe trade war and supporting the global economy and oil demand.】

item.title: 澳大利亚金融业工会猛烈抨击澳新银行在Suncorp银行部门裁员
item.description: 澳大利亚金融业工会周四谴责澳新银行集团裁减Suncorp银行多个部门岗位的决定，称此次裁员违背了该集团在出售案获批时对员工作出的承诺。【原文：Australia's Finance Sector Union condemned ANZ Group's decision to cut jobs across multiple Suncorp Bank divisions on Thursday, saying the layoffs contradict the commitments it made to workers when the sale was approved.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，BitGo控股公司将其美国首次公开募股定价为每股18美元。
item.description: 据彭博社周三报道，知情人士透露，BitGo控股公司已将首次公开募股定价定为每股18美元，高于此前预告的区间。【原文：BitGo Holdings has priced its ​initial public offering at $18 per ‌share, above the marketed range, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday, citing people familiar with ‌the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普对格陵兰岛态度逆转提振美元；澳大利亚就业数据公布后澳元跳涨
item.description: 周四，美元兑主要货币延续隔夜涨势。此前美国总统特朗普撤回了对多个欧洲北约国家加征关税的威胁，并宣称已与北约就格陵兰岛控制权达成协议框架。【原文：The U.S. dollar held on to overnight gains against major peers on Thursday after President Donald Trump withdrew a threat to impose tariffs on a number of European NATO nations, trumpeting the framework of a deal with NATO over control of Greenland.】

item.title: 澳元因强劲就业数据攀升至15个月高点
item.description: 周四澳元汇率触及15个月高点，因美欧紧张局势明显缓和提振了市场风险偏好，而强劲的国内就业数据则降低了近期加息的可能性。【原文：The Australian dollar hit 15-month highs on Thursday as an apparent easing in U.S.-European tensions soothed risk sentiment, while a strong set of domestic jobs data narrowed the odds on a near-term rate hike.】

item.title: 苹果中国将对部分产品提供最高1000元的折扣
item.description: 苹果公司官网宣布，1月24日至27日期间，中国市场指定款iPhone、Mac、iPad及Apple Watch将享受最高1000元（约合143.60美元）的优惠。【原文：Apple in China will offer discounts of up to 1,000 yuan ($143.60) on designated iPhone, Mac, iPad and Apple Watches from January 24 to January 27, the company announced on its website.】

item.title: 独家：瓦莱罗收购委内瑞拉石油货运，作为华盛顿与加拉加斯协议的一部分
item.description: 据两名消息人士周三透露，瓦莱罗公司购入了一批委内瑞拉原油。这是美国墨西哥湾沿岸炼油商在华盛顿与加拉加斯达成协议后达成的首笔交易，该协议规定美国将购买最多5000万桶来自这个南美国家的原油。【原文：Valero bought a cargo of Venezuelan crude oil, two sources said on Wednesday, the first deal by a U.S. Gulf Coast refiner struck as part of Washington's deal with Caracas to buy up to 50 million barrels of the South American country's crude.】

item.title: 金价下跌，股市上涨，特朗普收回对格陵兰岛的威胁
item.description: 周四，美元走强，金价走软，股市反弹，此前美国总统唐纳德·特朗普放弃了关税威胁，并排除了以武力从盟国手中夺取格陵兰岛的可能性。【原文：The dollar was higher, gold softer and stocks on the rebound on Thursday after U.S. President Donald Trump dropped tariff threats and ruled out seizing Greenland from an ally by force.】

item.title: 澳大利亚失业率意外下降，推升加息预期
item.description: 澳大利亚12月就业数据远超预期，失业率意外降至七个月低点，促使市场缩小下月加息的可能性。【原文：Australian employment blew past forecasts in December and the jobless rate dropped unexpectedly to a seven-month low, leading markets to narrow the odds of an interest rate hike as soon as next month.】

item.title: 日本出口连续第四个月增长，部分得益于日元贬值
item.description: 日本政府周四公布的数据显示，去年12月日本出口连续第四个月增长。尽管对美国的出口放缓，但其他地区强劲的需求以及日元贬值带来的销售提振抵消了这一影响。【原文：Japan's exports rose for a fourth straight month in December, government data showed on Thursday, as slower shipments to the U.S. were offset by strong demand elsewhere as well as by a boost to sales from the yen's decline.】

item.title: 内存芯片价格飙升令消费电子制造商前景黯淡
item.description: 随着从英国树莓派到惠普等公司纷纷提高产品标价以抵消内存芯片成本的飙升，今年全球对智能手机、个人电脑和游戏机的需求预计将萎缩。【原文：Global demand for smartphones, personal computers and gaming consoles is expected to shrink this year as companies from Britain's Raspberry Pi to HP Inc raise sticker prices to offset surging memory chip costs.】

item.title: 美国众议院投票推翻明尼苏达州采矿禁令，参议院将接续审议
item.description: 美国众议院周三投票推翻了前总统乔·拜登在明尼苏达州北部实施的采矿禁令，此举为安托法加斯塔公司的双金属铜、钴和镍项目注入了新的动力。【原文：The U.S. House of Representatives on Wednesday voted to overturn former President Joe Biden's mining ban in northern Minnesota, giving a boost to Antofagasta's Twin Metals copper, cobalt and nickel project.】

item.title: 沃尔玛、微软和Tiger Global将在PhonePe印度IPO中出售5070万股股票
item.description: 沃尔玛、微软和Tiger Global将在印度支付公司PhonePe的首次公开募股中出售约5070万股股票，周三发布的招股说明书草案显示。【原文：Walmart , ​Microsoft and ‌Tiger Global ‌will sell about ​50.7 million ‍shares of PhonePe PHOP.NS ⁠in ‍the Indian ‌payments ‌firm's initial public ⁠offering, ⁠a ​draft prospectus dated ‍Wednesday showed.】

item.title: Venture Global赢得西班牙雷普索尔公司提起的仲裁案
item.description: Venture Global周三表示，在与西班牙雷普索尔公司就其卡尔卡修通道项目液化天然气销售的长期供应合同纠纷中，仲裁庭已作出对其有利的裁决。【原文：Venture Global said on Wednesday an arbitration tribunal had ruled in its favour in a dispute with Spain's Repsol over liquefied natural gas sales from its Calcasieu Pass project under a long-term supply contract.】

item.title: 霍尼韦尔与Flexjet达成和解，延长发动机维护协议
item.description: 霍尼韦尔周三表示，已与私人航空公司Flexjet达成协议，以解决双方诉讼纠纷，并致力于重建商业伙伴关系。【原文：Honeywell said on Wednesday it had reached an agreement with private aviation company Flexjet to resolve their litigation and aims to rebuild their commercial partnership.】

item.title: 交易日：格陵兰协议希望带来缓解
item.description: 周三，美国股市大涨，国债收益率下跌。此前，美国总统特朗普表示已就格陵兰岛达成协议框架，并宣布原定于2月1日对多个欧洲国家加征的关税将不再实施。【原文：U.S. stocks jumped and Treasury yields fell on Wednesday after President Donald Trump said a framework of an agreement over Greenland had been reached, and that tariffs on several European countries scheduled for February 1 will no longer be imposed.】

item.title: 特朗普称美联储主席人选可能只剩一人
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周三表示，他即将选定美联储新任主席，并补充说他倾向于让白宫经济顾问凯文·哈塞特继续留任现职。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday ​indicated he was close to choosing the new chair of the Federal Reserve, adding he liked the idea ‌of keeping White House economic adviser Kevin Hassett in his current post.】

item.title: 特朗普称已接到信用卡公司的来电
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周三表示，他已接到多家信用卡公司的来电，称这些公司应该"给民众一些喘息空间"。这位共和党领导人同时重申了限制信用卡利率的提案。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Wednesday he has had calls from credit-card companies, ​saying those firms should "give people a break," as the Republican ‌leader doubled ‌down on a proposal to cap credit-card interest rates.】

item.title: 金德摩根季度利润超预期，得益于强劲天然气需求
item.description: 金德摩根公司周三公布的第四季度利润超出华尔街预期，这得益于其管道输送的天然气量增加。【原文：Kinder Morgan beat Wall Street expectations for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, helped by higher volumes of natural ​gas transported through its pipelines.】

item.title: F/m Investments公司寻求美国证券交易委员会批准，将国库券ETF份额代币化
item.description: F/m Investments周三表示，该公司已向监管机构提交申请，寻求批准在其美国国债3个月期票据（TBIL）ETF中，将代币化股票的所有权记录在许可型区块链上。【原文：F/m Investments said on Wednesday that the asset manager has filed with a regulator for approval to record ownership of tokenized shares ​in its U.S. Treasury 3-month bill (TBIL) ETF on a permissioned ‌blockchain.】

item.title: 铜价攀升，供应紧张，需求成焦点
item.description: 周三铜价在前一交易日大幅下跌后回升，投资者关注美国以外地区的库存紧张状况，尽管交易员质疑需求能否持续。【原文：Copper prices rose on Wednesday after a sharp decline in the previous session, as investors focused on tight inventories outside the U.S., even as traders questioned whether demand would be sustained.】

item.title: 美国参议院委员会将就票价问题举行听证会，邀请摇滚歌手基德·洛克及Live Nation公司高管出席
item.description: 美国参议院商务委员会下周将就打击票务不公问题举行听证会，届时票务巨头Ticketmaster母公司Live Nation的高管及艺人基德·洛克将出席作证，一名参议院助理向路透社透露。【原文：A U.S. Senate Commerce panel will hold a hearing next week on efforts to crackdown on unfair ticketing issues that will include an executive from Ticketmaster-parent company Live Nation and entertainer Kid Rock, a Senate aide told Reuters.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，苹果公司将对Siri进行全面升级，将其打造为内置聊天机器人。
item.description: 据彭博社周三报道，苹果计划在今年晚些时候对Siri进行全面升级，将其打造为该公司首个人工智能聊天机器人。【原文：Apple plans to revamp Siri later this year by turning the digital assistant into the company's first artificial intelligence chatbot, Bloomberg News reported on Wednesday.】

item.title: 投资者反应：特朗普总统撤回关税威胁，称已就格陵兰岛交易达成框架协议
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德·特朗普周三撤回了对若干国家征收关税的威胁，这些国家此前因对格陵兰岛的立场而受到威胁。他表示已与北约就该岛未来达成协议框架。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump on Wednesday withdrew a threat to impose tariffs on a number of nations for their stance on Greenland, saying he had reached the outlines of a deal with NATO on the island's future.】

item.title: 美联航在芝加哥奥黑尔机场与美国航空的争端升级中划下"红线"
item.description: 美联航周三在芝加哥奥黑尔国际机场与美航的长期争端升级，首席执行官斯科特·柯比承诺将增开"所需数量的航班"，以阻止美航在2026年以牺牲美联航利益为代价获得更多登机口。【原文：United Airlines escalated its long-running battle with American Airlines at Chicago's O'Hare International Airport on Wednesday, with CEO Scott Kirby pledging to add "as many flights as are required" to stop American from gaining additional gates at United's expense in 2026.】

item.title: 美国官员称联邦航空管理局并非波音MAX 7、10型飞机认证的障碍
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局局长周三表示，该机构并非阻碍波音公司为两款新型波音737 MAX机型获得认证的障碍。【原文：The head of the Federal Aviation Administration said on Wednesday the agency is not the roadblock to Boeing winning certification of two new variants of the Boeing 737 MAX.】

item.title: 大众汽车报告现金流增强，尽管保时捷业务受挫且中国市场销售疲软
item.description: 尽管欧洲最大汽车制造商大众汽车正面临中国市场销量疲软、美国关税担忧以及豪华运动品牌保时捷经营困境的三重压力，该公司周三公布的数据显示，2025年其净现金流仍将达到60亿欧元（约合70亿美元），超出市场预期。【原文：Volkswagen on Wednesday reported better-than-expected net cash flow in 2025 of 6 billion euros ($7 billion), despite Europe's largest carmaker struggling with weak China sales, U.S. tariff worries and difficulties at luxury sports brand Porsche.】

item.title: 据《Politico》报道，法院裁定TikTok目前可在加拿大继续运营。
item.description: 据《政客》周三报道，加拿大联邦法院已推翻政府关闭TikTok加拿大业务的命令，允许该平台至少暂时继续运营。【原文：Canada's federal court has overturned a government order to close TikTok's Canadian operations, allowing it to continue to operate at least for now, Politico reported on Wednesday.】
